scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production && node_modules/.bin/browserify -t coffee-reactify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify src/chessboard.cjsx --standalone Chessboard > index.js
scripts.watch: export NODE_ENV=development && node_modules/.bin/watchify -t coffee-reactify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] src/chessboard.cjsx --standalone Chessboard -o index.js --debug --verbose
